name: Wurkr
description: Our founders, Annil and Tim both UK based from London (England) have been a solid team for over three decades before this project came alive. Their realisation that there was no collaboration software, let alone a high tech one, that could help them work together from different geographies made them conceptualise Wurkr. When separated by distances, Annil and Tim experienced the impact of disconnected and isolated teams on business goals, employee health, creativity and productivity. And thus, they set on a mission to optimise the morale and productivity of distributed workforces. And that’s what we are all about!
features: Wurkr is the new disruptive, collaborative, online workspace that replicates your physical office ecosystem online.

Highlights.name: Real-time communication

Highlights.name: Collaborate
Highlights.description: With multiple screen-sharing, superior audio-video, and chat tools that enable a spontaneous human touch, your team’s happiness improves considerably.  Collaboration plays a significant role in virtual team building, employee experience and creating a healthy work environment.

enhanced_description: Wurkr is a disruptive, high-tech online workspace designed to replicate the physical office ecosystem, specifically catering to the needs of hybrid and remote teams. Founded by Annil and Tim, who recognized the impact of disconnected teams on business goals, employee health, creativity, and productivity, Wurkr aims to optimize the morale and productivity of distributed workforces. It facilitates collaboration through virtual offices, where users can easily join rooms for spontaneous interaction. The platform offers real-time communication tools including chats, multi-screen sharing, and superior video and audio conferencing capabilities, fostering a 'human touch' that enhances team happiness, virtual team building, and overall employee experience in a remote environment. Wurkr focuses on enabling employee well-being, greater flexibility, and achieving improved productivity for geographically dispersed teams.
